thread.title: Celebrity Big Brother HUGE cover-up: Rows, sex and plots not shown
thread.title_full: Celebrity Big Brother HUGE cover-up: Rows, sex and plots not shown

title: Celebrity Big Brother HUGE cover-up: Rows, sex and plots not shown
text:
SHOCKING: It is believed that Bianca Gascoigne and Jamie O’Hara had sex in the toilet 
But we can reveal that Jedward have had “numerous warnings’” for using the word “retard”. 
Channel 5 warned the twins that the phrase would cause a huge backlash if it was broadcast. 
The Irish brothers have also been ticked off for making rude gestures and for taking off microphones to plot against their housemates. The best bits from CBB 2017 Wednesday, 25th January 2017 Are you watching CBB 2017? Take a look at the best bits here! 1 / 102 
Three contestants have left the house on medical grounds but none of this has been aired. 
Insiders also believe Bianca Gascoigne and Jamie O’Hara had sex in the toilet, with Jedward revealing: “There are condoms missing.” 
Security was even put on standby when Calum Best and James Jordan fell out in the snug and almost came to blows. Hot-headed Calum backed off, saying: “We can’t fight in here.” 
GETTY OFFENSIVE: Jedward have had 'numerous warnings' for using the word 'retard' 
GETTY HUSH HUSH: Last year CBB tried to hide the fact that Christopher Biggins had made a Nazi joke 
This would not be the first time that CBB has covered things up. 
Last year they tried to hush up the fact that Christopher Biggins had made a sick Nazi joke to Jewish housemate Katie Waissel but it leaked out and he was evicted. 
Channel 5 has declined to comment. Related articles
